document.discussion_title: IDA trials SIM-login for US visitors using Wireless@SG
document.topic_text: IDA trials SIM-login for US visitors using Wireless@SG 40 CET | News Selected US visitors to Singapore can connect to Wireless@SG via the SIM-login feature. The service will be available until 21 September as part of a trial conducted by the Infocomm Development Authority of Singapore (IDA), in partnership with Land Transport Authority (LTA), M1, Sentosa Development Corporation (SDC), and Singtel.
